title: The Eden Project
description: Could you let millions die today to ensure a perfect future?Sienna’s senior year of high school unfolded as planned. The stage was set for a bright future… until that night.She hears shocking news and learns her true identity, setting her on a new, unplanned path.Now everything has changed. Sienna has a chance to become a force. She must make a choice – one that will decide the fate of her family, friends and the world.The Eden Project takes us on a wild ride into the future of the possibility of medicine and a brilliant teen.
author: Elizabeth Noxon
